UD_API
scriptname UD_API extends Quest

This is mod interface for Unforgiving Devices.  It should be prefered to use these functions instead of functions from modules, as it will be backward compatible

Functions
Ready
bool Function Ready()
Returns

True if mod is fully loaded and ready

TraceAllowed
bool Function TraceAllowed()

Allways use this function first beffore calling Log function!

Otherwise performance can be greatly affected for users which don't use Papyrus logging

Example
Function fun()
   if UDAPI.TraceAllowed()
       UDAPI.Log("fun called!",2)
   endif
   ; ||              ||
   ; VV FUNCTINALITY VV
EndFunction
Returns

True if logging is enabled

Log
Function Log(
String asMsg,
int aiLevel = 1
)

Prints one line of text to Papyrus log

Note that users needs to have Papyrus logging enabled first

Parameters
asMsg
String

Message which should be printed to Papyrus log.

aiLevel
int

(optional) Level of imporatance for message. Is used for filtering messages based on MCM setting. 1 means most important message and 5 least important message

CLog
Function CLog(
String asMsg
)

Prints one line of text to console. User first needs to have ConsoleUtil installed!

Parameters
asMsg
String

Message which should be printed to Console

Print
Function Print(
String asMsg,
int aiLevel = 1,
bool abLog = false
)

Prints one line of text to skyrim text output (left upper corner)

Parameters
asMsg
String

Message which should be printed to Console

aiLevel
int

(optional) Level of imporatance for message. Is used for filtering messages based on MCM setting. 1 means most important message and 5 least important message

abLog
bool

(optional) Set to true if the message should be also added to Papyrus log

String asMsg
)

Prints one line of info message to console and Papyrus log

This function is intended to be only ussed for debugging

True if passed akActor is follower

ActorIsValidForUD
bool Function ActorIsValidForUD(
Actor akActor
)

This function check if passed actor is valid for Unforgiving Devices (wearing devices, orgasm system, etc...).

Following conditions have to be meet for actor to be valid

  • Actor is not child

  • Actors race is playable

  • Actor is not dead

  • Actor is not male IF For Him is not installed

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor which will be checked

Returns

True if passed akActor is valid

ActorInCloseRange
bool Function ActorInCloseRange(
Actor akActor
)

This function check if passed actor is close to Player

Checked range depends on MCM setting Hearing range

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actor which will be checked if they are in close range of Player

Returns

True if passed akActor is close to player

IsMenuOpen
Bool Function IsMenuOpen()

This function check if any menu is open. It is much faster then its UI couterpart

Returns

True if any menu is open

IsMenuOpenID
Bool Function IsMenuOpenID(
int aiID
)

This function check if specific menu is open

Parameters
aiID
int

ID of menu which should be checked. See Menus ID

Returns

True if menu with aiID is open

isRegistered
bool Function isRegistered(
Actor akActor
)

Parameters

Actor which should be checked

Returns

True if passed actor is registered

UpdateBaseOrgasmVals
Function UpdateBaseOrgasmVals(
Actor akActor,
int aiDuration,
float afOrgasmRate,
float afForcing = 0.0,
float afArousalRate = 0.0
)

Updates actor orgasm values of set amount of time.  This function is not blocking.

WARNING: Both afOrgasmRate and afForcing are recalculated for storage. Because of that, precision is 0.01.All smaller information will be lost.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors whose orgasm values should be updated

aiDuration
int

duration of effect

afOrgasmRate
float

by how much is orgasm rate increased while effect is on

afForcing
float

how much is orgasm forcing increased (0.0 = masturbation / 1.0> = forced orgasm) while effect is on

afArousalRate
float

how much is arousal rate increased while effect is on

GetOrgasmExhaustion
Int Function GetOrgasmExhaustion(
Actor akActor
)
Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors whose value will be returned

Returns

Returns actors number of current orgasm exhaustions

GetOrgasmRate
Float Function GetOrgasmRate(
Actor akActor,
Int aiMode = 0
)
Note: Actual orgasm rate can be calculated as OrgasmRate

AntiOrgasmRate

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors whose value will be returned

aiMode
Int

0 = returns value affected by modifier. 1 = returns raw value

Returns

Return current orgasm rate of actor

UpdateOrgasmRate
Float Function UpdateOrgasmRate(
Actor akActor ,
float afOrgasmRate,
float afOrgasmForcing
)

NOTE: The value will be not changed back. Allways change the value back to original values !!!!!  WARNING: Both afOrgasmRate and afForcing are recalculated for storage. Because of that, precision is 0.01. All smaller information will be lost.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors whose value will be updated

afOrgasmRate
float

By how much should be orgasm rate updated. Can be both positive and negative

afOrgasmForcing
float

By how much should be orgasm forcing updated. Can be both positive and negative

Returns

Return actors new orgasm rate after update

UpdateArousalRate
Float Function UpdateArousalRate(
Actor akActor ,
float afArousalRate
)

NOTE: The value will be not changed back. Allways change the value back to original values !!!!!  WARNING: afArousalRate is recalculated for storage. Because of that, precision is 0.01.All smaller information will be lost.

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors whose value will be updated

afArousalRate
float

By how much should be arousal rate updated. Can be both positive and negative

Returns

Return actors new arousal rate after update

Orgasm
Function Orgasm(
Actor akActor,
int aiDuration,
int aiArousalDecrease = 10,
int aiForce = 0,
bool abBlocking = true
)

NOTE: The value will be not changed back. Allways change the value back to original values !!!!!  WARNING: Some animations might look weird if duration is different then 20 seconds

Parameters
akActor
Actor

Actors who will orgasm

aiDuration
int

How long will actor orgasm

aiArousalDecrease
int

By how much will be arousal decreased over time. Duration is set in MCM

aiForce
int

0 = Self caused orgasm, 2 = Forced orgasm , 1 = Something between

abBlocking
bool

If function should be blocked untill orgasm fully start

Returns

Return actors new orgasm capacity after update

GetUserTextInput
string Function GetUserTextInput()

Opens text input menu, and returns its result

NOTE: User needs to have UI Extensions installed for this to work!

Returns

Return string written to text menu

GetUserListInput
Int Function GetUserListInput(
string[] apList
)

Opens list menu and returns index of selected line. Top is 0, bottom is max index

NOTE: User needs to have UI Extensions installed for this to work!

Parameters
apList
string[]

String array of list elements which will be shown in menu

Returns

Index of selected line
